card.name: Aerial Maneuver
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Angelic Edict
card.text: Exile target creature or enchantment.

card.name: Angelic Skirmisher

card.name: Assault Griffin
card.text: Flying

card.name: Blind Obedience
card.text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Court Street Denizen
card.text: Whenever another white creature enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Debtor's Pulpit

card.name: Dutiful Thrull
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Dutiful Thrull.

card.name: Gideon, Champion of Justice
card.text: +1: Put a loyalty counter on Gideon, Champion of Justice for each creature target opponent controls. 0: Until end of turn, Gideon becomes an indestructible Human Soldier creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on him. He's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn. -15: Exile all other permanents.

card.name: Guardian of the Gateless
card.text: Flying Guardian of the Gateless can block any number of creatures. Whenever Guardian of the Gateless blocks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature it's blocking.

card.name: Guildscorn Ward
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from multicolored.

card.name: Hold the Gates
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 for each Gate you control and have vigilance.

card.name: Holy Mantle

card.name: Knight Watch
card.text: Put two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance onto the battlefield.

card.name: Luminate Primordial
card.text: Vigilance When Luminate Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, exile up to one target creature that player controls and that player gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Murder Investigation
card.text: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature dies, put X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is its power.

card.name: Righteous Charge
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Smite

card.text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

card.name: AEtherize
card.text: Return all attacking creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Agoraphobia

card.name: Cloudfin Raptor
card.text: Flying Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Diluvian Primordial
card.text: Flying When Diluvian Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may cast up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a card cast this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Enter the Infinite
card.text: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your library, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

card.name: Frilled Oculus
card.text: {1}{G}: Frilled Oculus gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Gridlock
card.text: Tap X target nonland permanents.

card.name: Hands of Binding
card.text: Tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Incursion Specialist
card.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Incursion Specialist gets +2/+0 until end of turn and is unblockable this turn.

card.name: Keymaster Rogue
card.text: Keymaster Rogue is unblockable. When Keymaster Rogue enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Last Thoughts
card.text: Draw a card Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Leyline Phantom
card.text: Whenever Leyline Phantom deals combat damage, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Metropolis Sprite
card.text: Flying {U}: Metropolis Sprite gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Mindeye Drake
card.text: Flying When Mindeye Drake dies, target player puts the top five cards of its or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Rapid Hybridization
card.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller puts a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Realmwright
card.text: As Realmwright enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Lands you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types.

card.name: Sage's Row Denizen
card.text: Whenever another blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Sapphire Drake
card.text: Flying Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

card.name: Scatter Arc
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell. Draw a card.

card.name: Simic Manipulator
card.text: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) {T}, Remove one or more +1/+1 counters from Simic Manipulator: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of +1/+1 counters removed this way.

card.name: Hellkite Tyrant

card.text: Massive Raid deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Molten Primordial

card.name: Ripscale Predator

card.name: Spire Tracer
card.text: Spire Tracer can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

card.name: Sylvan Primordial
card.text: Reach When Sylvan Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, destroy target noncreature permanent that player controls. For each permanent destroyed this way, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Tower Defense
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+5 and gain reach until end of turn.

card.name: Verdant Haven
card.text: Enchant land When Verdant Haven enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, it's controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Alms Beast
card.text: Creatures blocking or blocked by Alms Beast have lifelink.

card.name: Assemble the Legion
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a muster counter on Assemble the Legion. Then put a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste onto the battlefield for each muster counter on Assemble the Legion.

card.name: Aurelia, the Warleader
card.text: Flying, vigilance, haste Whenever Aurelia, the Warleader attacks for the first time each turn, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Aurelia's Fury
card.text: Aurelia's Fury deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Tap each creature dealt damage this way. Players dealt damage this way can't cast noncreature spells this turn.

card.name: Bane Alley Broker
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down. You may look at cards exiled with Bane Alley Broker. {U}{B}, {T}: Return a card exiled with Bane Alley Broker to its owner's hand.

card.name: Biovisionary
card.text: At the beginning of the end step, if you control four or more creatures named Biovisionary, you win the game.

card.text: Trample Whenever Borborygmous Enraged deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Discard a land card: Borborygmos Enraged deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.text: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.

card.text: Flying, trample

card.name: Duskmantle Seer

card.text: Whenever High Priest of Penance is dealt damage, you may destroy target nonland permanent.

card.name: Lazav, Dimir Mastermind

card.name: Martial Glory
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Master Biomancer

card.name: Merciless Eviction
card.text: Choose one - Exile all artifacts; or exile all creatures; or exile all enchantments; or exile all planeswalkers.

card.name: Mind Grind
card.text: Each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals X land cards, then puts all cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard. X can't be 0.

card.name: Mortus Strider
card.text: When Mortus Strider dies, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mystic Genesis
card.text: Counter target spell. Put an X/X green Ooze creature token onto the battlefield, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Nimbus Swimmer
card.text: Flying Nimbus Swimmer enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Obzedat, Ghost Council
card.text: When Obzedat, Ghost Council enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. At the beginning of your end step you may exile Obzedat. If you do, return it to the battlefield under it's owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste.

card.name: One Thousand Lashes
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 1 life.

card.name: Orzhov Charm
card.text: Choose one - Return target creature you control and all Auras you control attached to it to their owners' hands; or destroy target creature and you lose life equal to that creature's toughness; or return target creature card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Paranoid Delusions
card.text: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Primal Visitation
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has haste.

card.name: Prime Speaker Zegana
card.text: Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among other creatures you control. When Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to its power.

card.name: Psychic Strike
card.text: Counter target spell. Its controller puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Purge the Profane
card.text: Target opponent discards two cards and you gain two life.

card.name: Rubblehulk
card.text: Rubblehulk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control. Bloodrush - {1}{R}{G}, Discard Rubblehulk: Target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

card.name: Shambleshark
card.text: Flash Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Signal the Clans
card.text: Search your library for three creature cards and reveal them. If you reveal three cards with different names, choose one of them at random and put that card into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your library.

card.name: Simic Charm
card.text: Choose one - Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn; permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn; or return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Skarrg Guildmage
card.text: {R}{G}: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. {1}{R}{G}: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Skyknight Legionnaire
card.text: Flying, haste

card.name: Soul Ransom
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Discard two cards: Soul Ransom's controller sacrifices it, then draws two cards. Only an opponent may activate this ability.

card.name: Spark Trooper
card.text: Trample, lifelink, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Trooper.

card.name: Sunhome Guildmage
card.text: {1}{R}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. {2}{R}{W}: Put a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste onto the battlefield.

card.name: Treasury Thrull
card.text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Whenever Treasury Thrull attacks, you may return target artifact, creature, or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Truefire Paladin
card.text: Vigilance {R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gets first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Unexpected Results
card.text: Shuffle your libary, then reveal the top card. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying it's mana cost. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield and return Unexpected Results to its owner's hand.

card.name: Urban Evolution
card.text: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

card.name: Vizkopa Confessor
card.text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) When Vizkopa Confessor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. Target opponent reveals that many cards from his or her hand. You choose one of them and exile it.

card.name: Vizkopa Guildmage
card.text: {1}{W}{B}: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn. {1}{W}{B}: Whenever you gain life this turn, each opponent loses that much life.

card.name: Whispering Madness
card.text: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Zameck Guildmage
card.text: {G}{U}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. {G}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

card.name: Arrows of Justice
card.text: Arrows of Justice deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Beckon Apparition
card.text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Put a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Biomass Mutation
card.text: Creatures you control become X/X until end of turn.

card.name: Bioshift
card.text: Move any number of +1/+1 counters from target creature onto another target creature with the same controller.

card.name: Boros Reckoner
card.text: Whenever Boros Reckoner is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target creature or player. (R/W): Boros Reckoner gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Burning-Tree Emissary
card.text: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Coerced Confession
card.text: Target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. You draw a card for each creature card put into a graveyard this way.

card.name: Deathcult Rogue
card.text: Deathcult Rogue can't be blocked except by Rogues.

card.name: Gift of Orzhova
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink.

card.name: Immortal Servitude
card.text: Return each creature with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Merfolk of the Depths
card.text: Flash

card.name: Nightveil Specter
card.text: Flying Whenever Nightveil Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library. You may play cards exiled with Nightveil Specter.

card.name: Pit Fight
card.text: Target creature you control fights another target creature.

card.name: Rubblebelt Raiders
card.text: Whenever Rubblebelt Raiders attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each attacking creature you control.

card.name: Shattering Blow
card.text: Exile target artifact.

card.name: Armored Transport
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Armored Transport by creatures blocking it.

card.name: Boros Keyrune
card.text: {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. {R}{W}: Boros Keyrune becomes a 1/1 red and white Soldier artifact creature with double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Dimir Keyrune
card.text: {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. {U}{B}: Dimir Keyrune becomes a 2/2 blue and black Horror until end of turn and is unblockable this turn.

card.name: Glaring Spotlight
card.text: Creatures your opponents control with hexproof can be the target of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof. {3}, Sacrifice Glaring Spotlight: Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn and are unblockable this turn.

card.name: Gruul Keyrune
card.text: {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. {R}{G}: Gruul Keyrune becomes a 3/2 red and green Beast artifact creature with trample until end of turn.

card.name: Illusionist's Bracers
card.text: Whenever an ability of equipped creature is activated, if it isn't a mana ability, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. Equip {3}

card.name: Millennial Gargoyle
card.text: Flying

card.name: Orzhov Keyrune
card.text: {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. {W}{B}: Orzhov Keyrune becomes a 1/4 white and black Thrull artifact creature with lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Prophetic Prism
card.text: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Razortip Whip
card.text: {1}, {T}: Razortip Whip deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Riot Gear
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+2. Equip {2}

card.name: Simic Keyrune
card.text: {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. {G}{U}: Simic Keyrune becomes a 2/3 green and blue Crab artifact creature with hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Skyblinder Staff
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked by creatures with flying. Equip {3}

card.name: Boros Guildgate
card.text: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Breeding Pool
card.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.) As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Breeding Pool enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Dimir Guildgate
card.text: Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your manapool.

card.name: Godless Shrine
card.text: ({T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.) As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Godless Shrine enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Gruul Guildgate
card.text: Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Orzhov Guildgate
card.text: Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Sacred Foundry
card.text: ({T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.) As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Simic Guildgate
card.text: Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}:Add {U} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Stomping Ground
card.text: ({T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.) As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Stomping Ground enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Thespian's Stage
card.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Thespian's Stage becomes a copy of target land and gains this ability.

card.name: Watery Grave
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Watery Grave enters the battlefield tapped.
